import micropip as mp
await mp.install("pandas")
await mp.install("https://duckdb.github.io/duckdb-pyodide/wheels/duckdb-1.2.0-cp311-cp311-emscripten_3_1_46_wasm32.whl")
import pandas as pd
import duckdb


df = pd.DataFrame({'x': [1, 2, 3]})
result = duckdb.query("SELECT x, x*2 AS double FROM df").to_df()
print(result)
con = duckdb.connect("mydata11.duckdb")  # creates or opens a DuckDB file
con.execute("CREATE TABLE mytable AS SELECT * FROM df")
